clartigr API documentation version v1

http://{host}/api/v1

Invoker chef

Use this invoker to run arbitrary, supported executables in an ad-hoc manner.

/invokers/chef/runs

/invokers/chef/runs get post

get

List all runs

post

Add a new run

get /invokers/chef/runs

List all runs

  • Request
  • Response

Query Parameters

  • status: (string)

    Filter runs by status ('running', 'finished', etc.)

    Example:

    running

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "array",
  "description": "List of runs"
}

post /invokers/chef/runs

Add a new run

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "invoker_config": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "access": {
              "description": "Currently supported access mechanisms: local, ssh",
              "type": "string",
              "default": "local"
            },
            "min_runs": {
              "description": "Min number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 1
            },
            "max_runs": {
              "description": "Max number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 3
            },
            "ssh_port": {
              "description": "SSH port",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 22
            },
            "ssh_host": {
              "description": "SSH host (DNS name or IP address)",
              "type": "integer"
            },
            "ssh_user": {
              "description": "SSH username",
              "type": "string",
              "default": "ubuntu"
            },
            "ssh_private_key": {
              "description": "SSH private key",
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        },
        "run_list": {
          "type": "array",
          "default": []
        }
      }
    },
    "results": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "stderr": {
          "type": "string"
        },
        "run_list": {
          "type": "object",
          "description": "Chef run list used for invocation"
        },
        "ps": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Running processes after invocation"
        },
        "logs": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Log messages put to stdout"
        }
      }
    },
    "_links": {
      "type": "object",
      "patternProperties": {
        "[a-zA-Z0-9-_.]+": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "href": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "_id": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "status": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "created": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "finished": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "failed": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "error": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "executable": {
      "type": "object",
      "oneOf": [
        {
          "properties": {
            "files": {
              "type": "array",
              "items": {
                "type": "object",
                "oneOf": [
                  {
                    "properties": {
                      "path": {
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "text": {
                        "type": "string"
                      }
                    }
                  },
                  {
                    "properties": {
                      "path": {
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "object": {
                        "type": "object"
                      }
                    }
                  },
                  {
                    "properties": {
                      "path": {
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "base64": {
                        "type": "string"
                      }
                    }
                  },
                  {
                    "properties": {
                      "path": {
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "url": {
                        "type": "string"
                      }
                    }
                  }
                ]
              }
            }
          }
        },
        {
          "properties": {
            "tarball_url": {
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "parameters"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "parameters": {
    "invoker_config": {
      "access": "local",
      "min_runs": 1,
      "max_runs": 3,
      "ssh_port": 22,
      "ssh_user": "ubuntu"
    },
    "some_param": "some_value",
    "run_list": []
  }
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",

      "type": "string"

      "type": "object",

Example:

{
  "parameters": {
    "invoker_config": {
      "access": "local",
      "min_runs": 1,
      "max_runs": 3,
      "ssh_port": 22,
      "ssh_user": "ubuntu"
    },
    "some_param": "some_value",
    "run_list": []
  },
  "_id": "eae393ac-b766-4ffc-a69b-d41e37b3f5b2",
  "status": "running"
}

/invokers/chef/runs/{runId} get put delete

get

Get run details

put

Update run to set status, e.g., to 'running'

delete

Delete run permanently

get /invokers/chef/runs/{runId}

Get run details

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • runId: required (string)

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "invoker_config": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "access": {
              "description": "Currently supported access mechanisms: local, ssh",
              "type": "string",
              "default": "local"
            },
            "min_runs": {
              "description": "Min number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 1
            },

              "description": "Max number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 3

              "type": "integer",
              "default": 22

        "[a-zA-Z0-9-_.]+": {

      "access": "local",
      "min_runs": 1,

      "ssh_port": 22,

  "_id": "eae393ac-b766-4ffc-a69b-d41e37b3f5b2",
  "status": "running"

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{ "message": "run missing" }

put /invokers/chef/runs/{runId}

Update run to set status, e.g., to 'running'

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • runId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "parameters": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "invoker_config": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "access": {
              "description": "Currently supported access mechanisms: local, ssh",
              "type": "string",
              "default": "local"
            },
            "min_runs": {
              "description": "Min number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 1
            },
            "max_runs": {
              "description": "Max number of runs",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 3
            },
            "ssh_port": {
              "description": "SSH port",
              "type": "integer",
              "default": 22
            },
            "ssh_host": {
              "description": "SSH host (DNS name or IP address)",
              "type": "integer"
            },
            "ssh_user": {
              "description": "SSH username",
              "type": "string",
              "default": "ubuntu"
            },
            "ssh_private_key": {
              "description": "SSH private key",
              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        },
        "run_list": {
          "type": "array",
          "default": []
        }
      }
    },
    "results": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "stderr": {
          "type": "string"

          "type": "object",

        "ps": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Running processes after invocation"
        },
        "logs": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Log messages put to stdout"
        }
      }
    },
    "_links": {
      "type": "object",
      "patternProperties": {
        "[a-zA-Z0-9-_.]+": {
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {

              "type": "string"
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    "_id": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "status": {
      "type": "string"

  ]
}

{ "status": "running" }

delete /invokers/chef/runs/{runId}

Delete run permanently

  • Request

URI Parameters

  • runId: required (string)
  • /invokers/chef/runs
